name: The Laws of Seph
flavorText: Seph the Patriarch, for whom this stone was named, was famed for illuminating concepts in a way that led to epiphanies in his students. In much the same way, this spirit stone casts the glorious light generated by its wearer deep inside the monk’s soul as well as outward to blind enemies.
flavorTextHtml: Seph the Patriarch, for whom this stone was named, was famed for illuminating concepts in a way that led to epiphanies in his students. In much the same way, this spirit stone casts the glorious light generated by its wearer deep inside the monk’s soul as well as outward to blind enemies.

secondary.textHtml: Using Blinding Flash restores 158 Spirit. (Monk Only) [125 - 165]
